command.citruslib.team.create.must_leave:
YOU ARE ALREADY IN A TEAM!
You must leave to create a new one!
%s
command.citruslib.team.create.name_in_us: You cannot use %s for your new team as it is already in use.
command.citruslib.team.create.success: You created a new team with the name: %s
command.citruslib.team.invite.failure: No player by the name %s could be found.
command.citruslib.team.invite.invite_sel: You cannot invite yourself to a team!
command.citruslib.team.invite.message: You have been invited to join the %s team. To join -> %s
command.citruslib.team.invite.no_team: You can't invite someone when you're not in a team!
command.citruslib.team.invite.none: You have no team invites pending.
command.citruslib.team.invite.success: You have invited %s to join your team.
command.citruslib.team.join.must_leave:
YOU ARE ALREADY IN A TEAM!
You must leave it in order to join a new one!
%s
command.citruslib.team.join.not_exist: No team with the name %s can be found!
command.citruslib.team.join.success.memb: You are now a member of the team %s, Welcome!
command.citruslib.team.join.success.not_: You have not been invited to the %s team. Ask %s for an invite.
command.citruslib.team.join.success.owne: The team %s had no owner. You have now taken control!
command.citruslib.team.leave.cannot: You cannot leave your own personal team!
command.citruslib.team.leave.name_in_use: You cannot use %s for your new team as it is already in use.
command.citruslib.team.reject.not_exist: No team with the name %s can be found!
command.citruslib.team.reject.not_invite: You have not been invited to join %s!
command.citruslib.team.reject.success: You have rejected the invite to join %s.
command.citruslib.team.rename.name_in_us: Another team already has this name!
command.citruslib.team.rename.not_owner: You are not the owner of the team!
